content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, glad to meet you. I'm always ready to discuss the most important aspect of renting an apartment, the price. So, how much are you willing to pay for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering the attractive location and features of this apartment, I am eager to secure a reasonable deal. Let's start the negotiation with a proposal of 550 Euros per month, hoping for a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your proposal, but I must admit, 550 Euros per month is not enough for an apartment of this quality in such a prime location. I'm sure you understand that as a landlord, I need to receive a fair price for my property. So, I suggest we increase the offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective as a landlord and do not wish to undervalue your property. However, as a student, I am on a budget and need to be cautious with expenses. Let's continue negotiations with a revised offer of 600 Euros per month, hoping to strike an agreeable balance.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your budget constraints, but 600 Euros per month is still not enough for this apartment. The city center location, the close proximity to amenities, and the quality of the apartment all contribute to its value. Let's try to find a price that reflects that value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge the factors that contribute to the apartment's value, and I am committed to finding a price that satisfies both parties. As a compromise, I propose increasing my offer to 625 Euros per month. I hope this can serve as a good starting point for further discussion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your persistence is commendable, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, 625 Euros per month is still not enough for an apartment of this caliber. I understand that as a student, you may have financial constraints, but I assure you, the quality of this apartment and its prime location are worth a higher price. Let's aim higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your viewpoint on the apartment's value and I am determined to reach a suitable agreement. To show my commitment, I am raising my offer once again to 650 Euros per month. I believe this price reflects both the apartment's attributes and my financial capabilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your determination is impressive, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your commitment to finding a fair price for this apartment. 650 Euros per month seems to be a step in the right direction, but let's see if we can't push the price a little higher to reflect the true value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand the importance of finding a price that adequately represents the apartment's value while respecting my financial boundaries. In light of this, I'm prepared to increase my offer by another 25 Euros, bringing it to 675 Euros per month. I hope this proposal can serve as a basis for continued negotiations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your proposal is certainly moving towards a fair price, Yi-Nuo Wang. 675 Euros per month is closer to the value of this apartment, but let's see if we can't push the price a little higher to reflect the prime location and quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
